comment: This class is super easy, all quizess, midterms, exams online no lockdown or webcam, but BEWARE for the final exam she made it in person on paper and the majority failed, i went from a 100 to a B+. overall really easy and very little workload
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I took his contemporary economics class in the summer and it was all open note test and quizzes and he is very good with responding to emails and cared about helping me when I needed extra time.
Was a sweet lady but a terrible professor, and had mandatory "Extra credit".
rating_tags: Participation matters--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: All tests are online with no lockdown browser and her lectures do not cover everything on the test. She only grades the four tests, but there is occasional extra credit. She'll also start taking attendance if there's a small amount of people showing up to class. Definitely a good class if you're looking for an easy A.

If you need an easy A take this CLASS !! Her grades are 3 midterms without lockdown and webcam and all of her material is on quizlet. She also offers Plenty of extra credit. I went to this class twice the whole semester and got a 94 in the class. Super easy, def recommend

She talks a lot, and uses so many examples to the point where we are talking for 30 min about different kinds of bread. You talk about Land, Labor, Entrepreneur, and Capital for 2 months no cap. Repeats lectures every class, I'm telling you right now WE REREAD THE SAME POWERPOINT 3x over 2 days! easy A if you have had Econ before & do study guides
